about_the_game:
From the moment the Helaphestian opened, you and your world were doomed. Spared from the initial invasion, now only you remain, the last inhabitant of the last city. All else has been consumed by the Helaphestian. Chosen by your people, and fueled by their sacrifice, you must do everything in your power to repel this attack and prevent your world from annihilation.

Features:


Fight off vast swarms of enemies with your psychokinetic powers!
In THEOMACHIA, the environment is your weapon, and you are given a variety of psychokinetic abilities that let you leverage the environment to your advantage. Push enemies away with a powerful psychic wave, or launch nearby objects at them using your telekinesis!

Fight for your life in a procedural urban arena.
Every time you start a game, the layout of the arena is randomized, making each run a unique experience. Navigate the desolate city and its three distinct districts as you fight for your life and your world.

Upgrade your psychokinetic powers with dozens of abilities!
Obtain and upgrade dozens of psychokinetic powers to create a unique build that suits your playstyle. Your abilities can allow you to glide quickly through the city, take control of the environment and your enemies, or defend yourself against the scores of enemies.

  • Flee the storm as it devours your world.
  • Compete for the highest score on the global leaderboard.
  • Survive to get stronger: each wave you survive gives you points to upgrade your abilities.
  • Face off against over 20 distinct and dangerous enemies.
  • Discover the secrets of this abandoned world, and your own past.
  • Traverse the world with smooth movement abilities; dash through the air, cling to buildings, and glide above the city as you run from the storm.
  • Gain strength between runs.
  • Fight four deadly bosses as you fend off the transdimensional invaders.

short_description: THEOMACHIA is a high octane, physics-based wave shooter where you use a vast array of psychokinetic abilities. The environment is your only weapon; use it to fight off dangerous enemies - beings from another dimension sent to conquer yours.
